claims.quote: When they did the redistricting that tore us all up, they moved the lines all over the place. It's horrible.

claims.claim: Political redistricting can disadvantage known community representatives.
claims.quote: a friend of mine, he was, he was he was state representative, but when they moved the lines, he lost because lines went to, into the suburbs.

claims.claim: Redistricting can result in representatives unfamiliar to the community.
claims.quote: Some of the suburbs coming over into the city, the line moved over into the city. We don't know that person running for that's supposed to be representing us.

claims.claim: Returning citizens globally struggle with finding housing and employment.
claims.quote: So over there we were in Kenya and it was 23 countries there, 97 people all saying the same thing. Return to citizens have a hard time finding housing and work.

claims.claim: There is a universal challenge of reintegration for returning citizens.
claims.quote: Across the country, 23 countries saying the same thing.

claims.claim: Criminal records significantly impact a person's life despite personal and professional achievements.
claims.quote: When they did the redistricting that tore us all up, they moved the lines all over the place. It's horrible.
